plot: Saturday morning children's variety programme presented by Tommy Boyd and Isla St. Clair (with her dog, Angel) featuring games, cartoons and special guests.
plot_en: Saturday morning children's variety programme presented by Tommy Boyd and Isla St. Clair (with her dog, Angel) featuring games, cartoons and special guests.

title: The Saturday Show
